content.raw: Ok, so the auto-commit is not performant either when on Windows, or, when the globals file is on a network drive, or both. Considering disabling it, but then you need a way to say “commit” without closing the editor. Shift-enter would have been my go-to, but that is newline. Maybe ctrl-enter, but is sufficiently obscure that we really need a “keyboard shortcuts” help dialog or something.
